LanguageData.AncientBox_ComponentIndustrial.label: component box
LanguageData.AncientBox_ComponentIndustrial.descripti: A box filled with valuable components. Some are intact and useable.
LanguageData.AncientBox_ComponentSpacer.label: advanced component box
LanguageData.AncientBox_ComponentSpacer.description: A box of advanced components, well-preserved and potentially valuable.
LanguageData.AncientBox_SteelSlag.label: steel scrap box
LanguageData.AncientBox_SteelSlag.description: A box filled with steel scrap. It's heavy but might contain some recoverable metal.
LanguageData.AncientChemfuelCanister.label: chemfuel canister
LanguageData.AncientChemfuelCanister.description: A sealed canister of chemfuel. It might still contain usable fuel.
LanguageData.AncientPallet_SteelSlag.label: steel scrap pallet
LanguageData.AncientPallet_SteelSlag.description: A pallet stacked with steel scrap. It could still hold some recoverable metal.
LanguageData.AncientSafe.label: rusted safe
LanguageData.AncientSafe.description: A locked safe. It's heavily rusted, making it easy to open. It may hold valuable items inside.
LanguageData.AncientSealedContainer.label: sealed container
LanguageData.AncientSealedContainer.description: A large sealed container. It may contain valuable supplies.
LanguageData.AncientSealedContainer_GravshipUpgrade.d: A large sealed container. It may contain valuable supplies.
LanguageData.AncientSealedCrate.label: sealed crate
LanguageData.AncientSealedCrate.description: A small crate that's still sealed. There may be valuables inside.
LanguageData.AncientSealedCrate_Gravlite.label: sealed crate
LanguageData.AncientSealedCrate_Gravlite.description: A small crate that's still sealed. There may be valuables inside.
LanguageData.AncientSealedCrate_Shells.label: sealed crate
LanguageData.AncientSealedCrate_Shells.description: A small crate that's still sealed. There may be valuables inside.
LanguageData.MalfunctioningTransportPod.label: malfunctioning transport pod
LanguageData.MalfunctioningTransportPod.description: A cargo pod with a faulty release mechanism. It's still sealed, holding unknown contents.
LanguageData.Pallet_Medicine.label: medicine pallet
LanguageData.Pallet_Medicine.description: A pallet containing old medical supplies. Some items might still be usable.
LanguageData.Pallet_SurvivalMeals.label: survival meal pallet
LanguageData.Pallet_SurvivalMeals.description: A pallet containing survival meals. The contents are damaged but some meals might still be salvageable.
LanguageData.SealedCrate.label: sealed crate
LanguageData.SealedCrate.description: A small crate that's still sealed. There may be valuables inside.
